description:
This new tool serves to delete pesky and unwanted toolbars and plug-ins from your browser(s).
Simply download and run the Browser Cleanup utility without the need to install anything.
Once you run the utility, you will see a list of toolbars and plug-ins and be able to disable them with one simple click.
summary: This new tool serves to delete pesky and unwanted toolbars and plug-ins from your browser(s).
author: ALWIL Software
